Effects.Effect: Reduces the Magic Resist of enemy champions in a 600 unit radius by 20.
+12 Armor / +15 Magic Resistance / +8 Damage to nearby allied units.
3% of your max mana is converted to ability power.
Each time your champion uses an ability, their maximum mana will increase by 4. This effect has a 3 second cooldown. Bonus caps at 1000 mana.
Restores 12% of your maximum mana on kill or assist.
Increases your mana regeneration by 1% per 1% mana you're missing.
2% of your maximum health is added to your attack damage.
The Gold Per 10 aspect of this item is unique.
Blocks one negative spell every 30 seconds.
Deals 150 magic damage and slows the target champion by 50% for 3 seconds (400 range). 60 second cooldown.
When out of combat for 5 seconds, the effect of these boots is increased to Enhanced Movement 5.
Grants +2 attack damage per level.

Rengar collects trophies when killing Champions, and gains bonus effects based on how many trophies he has. Kills and assists grant 1 trophy, and 1 trophy is lost on death. 

 3 Trophies: +10 armor penetration, +5% cooldown reduction 
 6 Trophies: +25 movement speed 
 9 Trophies: Rengar's leap gains 150 bonus range. 
 14 Trophies: Thrill of the Hunt's duration is increased by 3 seconds. Additionally, Rengar's next ability used after activating Thrill of the Hunt generates 1 bonus Ferocity.
Restores 250 health and 200 mana upon leveling up over 8 seconds.
Increases your mana regen by 1% per 1% mana you're missing.
Deals magic damage to target champion equal to 25% of their current health (+4% per 100 ability power) with a minimum of 200 damage. 1 minute cooldown.
Grants 12-22% attack speed based on champion level and 8% critical strike chance for 4 minutes.
Grants 20-40 ability power based on champion level and reduces cooldowns by 10% for 4 minutes.
Grants 140-235 health based on champion level and 10 attack damage for 4 minutes.
Nearby allied champions gain 10 health regen per 5 seconds.
25% chance on hit to reduce your target's movement speed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.
Your attacks reduce your target's movement speed by 30% and deal 80 true damage over 2.5 seconds. Lasts 5 seconds. 60 second cooldown.
On each hit, you cause 4 damage per second for 8 seconds.
Inflicts target enemy champion with Grevious Wound, causing 50% reduced healing and regeneration for 8 seconds. 20 second cooldown.
Restores 0.35% of your champion's health every second.
Reduces ability cooldowns by 25%.
Reduces the attack speed of nearby enemies by 20%.
Your attacks reduce your target's movement speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds (30% for ranged attacks).
Revives your champion upon death, restoring 750 health and 375 mana. This effect can occur once every 5 minutes.
On each attack or spell cast, increases your attack speed by 4% and ability power by 6. Lasts 5 seconds. Stacks up to 8 times.
Restores 150 health over 15 seconds.
The Gold Per 10 aspect of this item is unique.
If you would take magic damage which would leave you at less than 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield which absorbs 250 magic damage for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.
Deals 300 magic damage and slows the target champion by 50% for 3 seconds (700 range). 60 second cooldown.
Your magic damage grants vision of your target for 4 seconds.
Covers an area with stealth-detectng mist, granting vision of all units which pass through it for 6 seconds. 60 second cooldown.
Every fourth attack unleashes a chain lightning, dealing 125 magic damage to up to 4 targets.
The Gold Per 10 aspect of this item is unique.
Your attacks deal magic damage equal to 2.5% of the target's maximum health.

Item.name: Leviathan
Item.Effects: Your champion gains 32 health per stack, receiving 2 stacks for a kill or 1 stack for an assist. This effect can stack 20 times. You lose a third of your stacks if you die. At 20 stacks, your champion takes 15% less damage.

Effects.Effect: After an ability is used, your next physical attack deals an additional 100% of your ability power in damage. This effect has a 2 second cooldown.
Nearby allied champions gain 15 health regeneration per 5 seconds.
Shield yourself and nearby allies for 5 seconds, absorbing up to 50 (+10 per level) damage. 60 second cooldown.
On hit, deals magic damage equal to 4% of the target's maximum health.
20% chance on attack to deal 300 damage to a minion.
Your physical attacks shred your target, dealing 20 magic damage and lowering their magic resistance by 6. Magic resistance reduction stacks up to 4 times.
Restores 7.2 mana per 5 seconds to yourself and nearby friendly champions.
Restores 100 mana over 15 seconds.
2% of your max mana is converted to attack damage.
Each time you attack, you gain one maximum mana (3 second cooldown). Each time you use an ability, you gain 4 maximum mana (3 second cooldown). Bonus caps at 1000 mana.
Gain +1 attack damage for every 2.5 health missing.
If you would take magic damage which would leave you at less than 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield which absorbs up to 400 magic damage for 5 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

Your champion gains 8 ability power per stack, receiving 2 stacks for a kill or 1 stack for an assist. This effect can stack 20 times. You lose a third of your stacks when you die. At 20 stacks, your champion's cooldowns are reduced by 15%.
Inflicts target enemy champion with Grievous Wounds, causing 50% reduced healing and regeneration for 8 seconds. 20 second cooldown.
Reduces the damage taken from non-turret basic attacks by 10%.
Reduces and stores 10% of the magic damage dealt to your champion.
Deals 200 + (stored magic) up to a maximum of 400 magic damage to nearby enemy units. 90 second cooldown.
Gives your champion stealth detection until they die.
Gives your champion stealth detection for 5 minutes or until they die.
25% chance on hit to reduce your target's movement speed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.
The Gold Per 10 aspect of this item is unique.
Doesn't stack with other Prospector items.
Doesn't stack with other Prospector items.
Removes all debuffs from your character. 90 second cooldown.
20% chance on being hit to slow the attacker's movement and attack speeds by 35% for 3 seconds.
Slows movement speeds and attack speeds of surrounding units by 35% for 2 seconds + 0.5 seconds for each 100 armor and magic resistance. 60 second cooldown.
Restores 250 health and 200 mana upon leveling up over 8 seconds.
Your champion gains 18 health, 20 mana, and 2 ability power every minute. Bonuses cap at 180 health, 200 mana, and 20 ability power.
Dealing spell damage slows the target's movement speed by 35% for 1.5 seconds (15% for multi-target and damage-over-time spells).
Your attacks grant 5 attack damage and 1% lifesteal for 4 seconds, stacking 7 times.
When an ability is used, your base damage is increased by 100% for your next attack. This effect has a 2 second cooldown.
Nearby champions gain 40% movement speed for 3 seconds (60 second cooldown).
Places an invisible ward that can see invisible enemy units. Lasts 3 minutes.
Gives nearby champions 12 mana regeneration per 5 seconds and 15% reduced cooldowns.
Increases healing and regeneration effects on yourself by 20%.
Deals 40 magic damage per second to nearby enemies.

Your champion gains 5 damage per stack, receiving 2 stacks for a kill or 1 stack for an assist. This effect can stack 20 times. You lose a third of your stacks if you die. At 20 stacks, your champion's movement speed is increased 15%.
Each time your champion uses an ability, their maximum mana increases by 4 mana up to a maximum of twice in a six second period. Bonuses cap at 1000 mana.
Your basic attacks reduce your target's armor by 15 for 5 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times.
Gain an additional 1 physical damage and 0.2% lifesteal per kill. Maximum of 40 damage and 10% lifesteal. Death removes half of these bonuses.
Your attacks grant vision of your target for 5 seconds.
On being hit by standard attacks, returns 30% of the damage taken as magic damage.
Your attacks splash, dealing physical damage in a small area around the target.
25% chance on hit to slow the target by 35% for 2.5 seconds. Your next attack deals bonus damage.
Places an invisible ward that can see invisible enemy units. Lasts 3 minutes.
20% chance on being hit to slow the attacker's movement and attack speeds by 35% for 3 seconds.

Permanently gain 4.5 health and .15 health regen per 5 seconds per minion kill. Champion kills and assists graint 45 health and 1.5 health regen per 5 seconds. Bonuses cap at 450 health and 15 health regen per 5 seconds.
Gives nearby allied champions 30 ability power and 20% spell vamp.
Physical attacks deal an additional 42 magic damage to the target.
On each hit, adds a buff to the user that increases magic resistance by 5. Stacks 4 times.
20% chance on attack to deal 425 magic damage to a minion.
Places an invisible ward with 1100 range sight that lasts for 3 minutes. 3 minute cooldown.
You gain 20% movespeed and 50% attack speed for 4 seconds. Attacking enemy units with melee attacks increases the duration by 2 seconds to a maximum of 8 seconds. 60 second cooldown.
Nearby allied champions gain +20 attack speed and +12% life steal.
Places your champion into statis for 2 seconds, rendering you invulnerable and untargetable but unable to take any actions. 90 second cooldown.
